attributes.action: Limit child benefit to just one child per family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country is being sucked try by serial scroungers who refuse to work, and live off the benefits given to them by the state. I believe limiting these benefits, starting with child benefit, would force people to seek some sort of gainful employment and ease the pressure on hard working taxpayers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
